mapper.sql: SA_ID, TRS_ID, TABLE_NAME, ALIAS_NAME, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_sql_alias_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_sql_alias_tb (SA_ID, TRS_ID, TABLE_NAME, ALIAS_NAME, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID ) values (#{saId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ht_sql_alias_tb
SA_ID,
TRS_ID,
TABLE_NAME,
ALIAS_NAME,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,
#{saId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ht_sql_alias_tb
SA_ID = #{record.saId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRS_ID = #{record.trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TABLE_NAME = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALIAS_NAME = #{record.aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_sql_alias_tb set SA_ID = #{record.saId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRS_ID = #{record.trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TABLE_NAME = #{record.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALIAS_NAME = #{record.aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_sql_alias_tb
TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALIAS_NAME = #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SA_ID = #{saId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_sql_alias_tb set TRS_ID = #{trsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALIAS_NAME = #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SA_ID = #{saId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
